```{r}
library(dplyr)
library('readr')
```

```{r}
demodata <- read.csv('/Users/lizheng/Desktop/RBC/HBN/HBN_BIDS/study-HBN_desc-participants.tsv', sep = '\t')
```

```{r}
age_min <- min(demodata$age, na.rm = TRUE)  # na.rm=TRUE：忽略缺失值
age_max <- max(demodata$age, na.rm = TRUE)

# 输出结果
cat("年龄最小值：", age_min, "\n")
cat("年龄最大值：", age_max, "\n")
```

```{r}
site_freq_dplyr <- demodata %>%
  count(study_site, name = "频数", na.rm = FALSE)  # na.rm=FALSE：保留缺失值
print("dplyr版频数分布：")
print(site_freq_dplyr)
```
